So, PC Recruiter, we are a CRM and an APS, and we are built specifically for recruiting. So, we actually have kind of two portions of almost two software products that come as one package. A purpose-built CRM for the recruiting industry, so it actually contains all of our ATS functions, but also in a CRM. So we do offer both ATS and CRM functionality, but we were built for recruiters. So that's kind of what PC Recruiter was mainly built for temp perm internal corporate no matter what kind so no problem there so the sales tracking piece is in the system but predominantly PC Recruiter really allows you to track your contacts your contact with them you have an activity history on each record that's going to show all of pretty much everything you've done emails interviews you can put in custom fields you can search the database so it's really tracking your relationships with the people be it that it's a contact a potential deal a candidate whomever so so the name records and tracking your contact with them it is I wouldn't say purpose built for executive search but we do have many executive search organizations using PC recruiter so we are going to give you ability to do a candidate presentation which is going to allow you to blind out the contact information of that candidate when you present you can control how long it's going to be up and available so you're going to be able to work with that and PC recruiter is going to give you ability to track your interviewees your positions custom interview pipelines and that could be whatever you need it to be it could be 18 steps it could be four so really it's up to you it's so configurable that you can really make it what you need it to be so that's going to give you a lot of flexibility there we are going to be able to track passive candidates. You're going to be able to track your contacts. You can schedule periodic follow-ups. You can even put them on a roll-up list. That's what we call our lists in PCRecruiter so you can put a list of the system which might keep all of your passive candidates and maybe even have a sequence set up to check in with them once every quarter or something like that so you have excellent passive candidate tracking within the system so you're gonna be able to track like I said all sorts of individuals you can tag them to where they work as you get more information on them you can attach additional searchable attachments to their record and keeping them out of roll-up list that's going to let you give them different stages statuses and priorities as well so you're going to be able to track those very easily our interface is going to be pretty intuitive and the fact that we have two separate interfaces that share the same database that's an added bonus so it is very configurable so you can control what fields are going to show where you can use a combination of our predefined fields and custom fields that you've created you can move buttons choose what's hidden what's shown so a lot of configurability that I'll show you once we get in there and take a look at that so it is going to be very configurable and being that you designed it how you think it should look and work that's going to make it make more sense to you because you're able to kind of set it up how you think it should look so that's going to work pretty well search capabilities so we do have a nice search capability there boolean search So that's going to search any word or words you're looking for, ands, ors, pluses, minus, whatnot. You're going to be able to make your search as simple or as complex as you like. So you're going to be able to search job title, function, you can keyword tag people, and it's going to search, as we'll see in the demo, it's going to search resumes, notes, keyword tags, all attachments. There's even a summary screen where you can use AI to generate a kind of a custom candidate summary. That is searchable. And the keyword tags, even profiles. So if you happen to pull someone in from LinkedIn or ZoomInfo or Facebook, they are going to have a searchable copy of their LinkedIn summary. So that's going to be searchable. You can even build custom web forms that you could fill out when you interviewed someone online. Or you could email it to them. They could fill it out in their email. and as soon as they do that, as soon as they hit save, that too is a searchable attachment. So you have a lot of different searchable areas. You can toggle back and forth and add another word or maybe a zip code radius or a specific custom field, a skill, anything like that. Searching is going to be very easy to use in PC Recruiter. And within the system, you're going to be able to share lists. If you have a short list of individuals, you can put those on a roll-up list. The roll-up lists in PC Recruiter are merely a group of records with something in common. So it could be a pre pipeline. It could be a saved search. It could be. These are the 10 people that I'm trying to contact to see if they're looking for A position that might fit what I'm looking for. So you can share those roll up lists. You could if more than one person. We're working on a roll up list, you would be able to see each other's activities. You could see if you mark them a different stage or priority or anything like that. So that is going to allow you to really very easily track that you're also going to have the ability to pull various different reports. So you can pull like applicant tracking reports showing kind of within a certain date range, everyone who has gone through any interview. You can, of course, limit that by client or by interview type or only things that I've done, anything like that. There's also a small custom piece that we can work with to allow you to give the client an access point where they could go in and see only their jobs and they can see a list of everyone who's being considered for the job, essentially see your pipeline. So they're able to kind of see just some basic information about what you're doing. So that's going to be something that our web team would be able to customize for you if you wish. As far as integration, we have the closest Outlook integration in the industry. So you're going to be able to integrate PC Recruiter into Outlook. Any email exchange with Outlook, we actually have an overlay for Gmail too. So either of those, any email you exchange in Outlook or Gmail is going to be recorded in the activities within PC Recruiter.
